title: Strengthening Mathematics Instructional Design Competencies Through Community-Based Practice Knowledge Exchange

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course applying community-based knowledge exchange to solve mathematics instructional design problems for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Can apply three or more community-based practical knowledge-sharing strategies to solve mathematics instructional design problems
Can submit an improved mathematics instructional design plan incorporating peer feedback in an LMS environment
Can analyze real-world case data collected from online communities and apply two or more insights to their instructional design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
